properties.name: common_name
properties.description: • common_name - (Required, string) The common name of the certificate.

properties.name: algorithm
properties.description: • algorithm - (Optional, string) Key encryption algorithm, either RSA or ECDSA. Defaults to "RSA".

properties.name: rsa_bits
properties.description: • rsa_bits - (Optional, integer) Number of bits to use when generating an RSA key. Applies when algorithm=RSA. Defaults to 2048.

properties.name: ecsa_curve
properties.description: • ecsa_curve - (Optional, string) Elliptic curve to use when generating an ECDSA key pair. Applies when algorithm=ECDSA. Defaults to "P521".

properties.name: san_dns
properties.description: • san_dns - (Optional, set of strings) List of DNS names to use as alternative subjects of the certificate.

properties.name: san_email
properties.description: • san_email - (Optional, set of strings) List of email addresses to use as alternative subjects of the certificate.

properties.name: san_ip
properties.description: • san_ip - (Optional, set of strings) List of IP addresses to use as alternative subjects of the certificate.

properties.name: key_password
properties.description: • key_password - (Optional, string) The password used to encrypt the private key.

properties.name: expiration_window
properties.description: • expiration_window - (Optional, integer) Number of hours before certificate expiry to request a new certificate.
